alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Cimarron; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued February 14 at 3:01AM CST until February 15 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE OKLAHOMA AND THE TEXAS PANHANDLE... * Affected Area...In Oklahoma...Cimarron...Texas and Beaver. In Texas...Dallam...Sherman...Hansford...Ochiltree...Lipscomb... Hartley...Moore...Hutchinson...Roberts...Hemphill...Oldham... Potter...Carson...Gray...Wheeler...Deaf Smith...Randall... Armstrong...Donley...Collingsworth and Palo Duro Canyon. * 20 Foot Winds...Southwest at 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 8 percent. * Red Flag Threat Index...4 to 7. * Timing...12 pm to 7 pm.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that the potential for critical fire weather conditions exists. Listen for later forecasts and possible red flag warnings.
